posts.post_content:
Two pretty bad beaters, but affordable opportunities to add two of the more expensive cards in the set. The Cobb is ripped in half and is in two pieces, but the Johnson is whole, minus the hole punches. Offers welcome and prices include shipping. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers.

Cobb- $300 Delivered

Johnson- $200 Delivered
